body.name: California Design Den 2-Pack Bed Pillows Queen Size Set of 2 for Sleeping, Cooling Luxury Hotel Pillows, for Back, Stomach or Side Sleepers

byLineInfo.name: Visit the California Design Den Store

features: 2-Pack Pillows for Double the Comfort: Elevate your sleep experience with our queen pillows set of 2, medium-soft designed for enhanced comfort and optimal support.
Ergonomic Support for Neck and Spine: Each pillow allows for a proper alignment for your neck and spine to alleviate discomfort and enhance sleep quality.

Adaptable for Every Sleep Style: Whether you prefer sleeping on your back, side, or stomach, our queen size pillows set of 2 caters to all sleep positions, ensuring a customized and revitalizing sleep experience each night.
100% Cotton Fabric - Breathable and cooling: Our queen size pillows 2 Pack promote air circulation, ensuring a refreshing and comfortable night's sleep.

Easy to Wash and Maintain: You can machine wash and dry our queen pillows set at a normal setting, and they will come out looking great for years. They are durable and will not lump or flatten for years.
body.description: Indulge in a blissful night's sleep with our 2 Pack Luxury Bed Pillows, thoughtfully designed to elevate your comfort and enhance your relaxation. These queen size pillows are a perfect fusion of premium materials and thoughtful features, ensuring a restful and rejuvenating experience. Luxurious Cotton Comfort: Immerse yourself in the sumptuous feel of our 2 Pack Down-alt Fill Pillows, featuring a 100% cotton fabric. As soon as you open, the high-quality material ensures that it quickly regains it shape. The pillows are generously filled with a premium down-alt fill, offering a perfect balance of plushness and support. Whether you prefer to sink into softness or seek reliable neck and head support, these pillows cater to your individual sleeping preferences. Upgrade your sleep sanctuary with the 2 Pack Pillows, where the perfect blend of luxurious materials and thoughtful packaging meets your desire for an exceptional night's rest. Imbibe your sleep routine with a touch of indulgence, courtesy of our premium pillow pair.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Plush Down-Alternative Fill, For All Sleeping Styles, Machine Washable, Durable, Cooling Cotton

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, yet supportive!
reviews.reviewText: These pillows have not disappointed me. They are quite soft but don't envelope your head. They are soft AND offer head support. I can even sleep with earrings and they don't hurt by morning. In the past, I have used pillows that make my ears hurt during the night to the point of disturbing my sleep. These allow sleep with no ear pain. Fully recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this
reviews.reviewText: I had to remove some of the fill, probably 5 handfuls, because I sleep on my back a lot and it was a little too high for me. I took it out of the middle so that there is a "groove" down the center where my head rests while still having neck support. It has helped a lot with me waking up with my mouth bone dry due to open-mouth breathing and probably snoring a little. I'm super fussy about a pillow so I was pleasantly surprised that I liked this one. I had been using another brand for years that had a seam actually sewn down the middle to give your neck support while not tilting your head too far forward, and it's been hard finding a good pillow. I'm happy with this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Fluffy Pillow but Smells like Chocolate
reviews.reviewText: We recently spent a few days at my sister-in-laws house. I loved the pillows she had on the bed. I order one for myself on the trip home. When my grandson and I opened the package, we immediately detected a chocolate “scratch & sniff” like scent. I figured it was the packaging, so put a pillow case on the pillow and placed it on a bed with freshly washed bedding. When I went to sleep that night, I again detected the chocolate scent. Several days later, the scent continues to be detectable. The smell is not awful but it does make me a bit concerned that there could be something unhealthy in the pillow. My sister-in-law’s pillows did not have a detectable odor. Besides the chocolate scent mystery, I am very happy with the pillow. I have not, as yet, added any of the extra filling that was included. The pillow is not referred to as the chocolate pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For years I have been in search of the ultimate pillow - after stumbling across this one and reading all of the good reviews I decided to try it.I am a side and back sleeper, so I opted to add all of the filling and put it in my dryer as the instructions guide you to do.The pillow fluffed up very well. I may decide to take out some of the filling as I continue to test it, but so far no more neck and shoulder pain for me.Couldn’t be more pleased with this purchase!!!Also, this pillow gets THICK if you do add the filling, just an FYI

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great support.
reviews.reviewText: I kept adjusting the fillings, but could not get it to feel comfortable. The pillow material already shows a hole after a couple weeks. Not happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pillows…super pleased.
reviews.reviewText: I waited a few months before reviewing these. I’m fairly picky when it comes to pillows and these is probably the best sleeping pillows I’ve ever used. The quality is really good on these and I love being able to customize the filling to suit my sleep comfort (side sleeper) and they don’t go flat like cheaper pillows do. I experimented with the inner gel filling until I got the perfect fill amount. These are holding up nicely after about 8 mos+-. The only thing to keep in mind is the banding will show through if you use thin pillow cases as seen in my pix. Other than that these are awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sleep in months!!
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful pillow. Sleeps cool. The best night's sleep I've had in months! Going to purchase another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like this pillow
reviews.reviewText: The pillow I had before was too high and caused neck and shoulder pain. This one is the right height and is comfortable. It even comes with extra stuffing if you want the pillow more firm or higher.

reviews.reviewTitle: Size Up To A King For Added Comfort!🥰 Smells New & Stuffing Looks Clean!👁👃👁
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I am VERY satisfied with this pillow. For several years, I’ve been using feather pillows because I enjoy being able to fluff them up when needed. Lately, my feather pillows have been bothering me. They become flat quickly and when I fluff them up they become so big that it kinks my neck. My husband has always complained about the pillows too, so we’ve been on a pillow hunt, to try and replace all of the ones we own in the house. ✅WHAT I LIKE: ▪️I’ve been using the pillow for just shy of one month. It is VERY comfortable and has kept its shape. I haven’t had to wake up to fluff it up in the middle of the night. ▪️This pillow came with an extra bag of stuffing. I ended up using all of it. I didn't think it was enough, but so far I am extremely happy with the comfort and firmness. ▪️I was VERY happy to see that the box the pillow came in had 3 tamper-proof seals. I ALWAYS look out for this when ordering personal-use items. The pillow was tightly wrapped and compressed within the box as well. ▪️At first, I was a bit disappointed I couldn’t order this pillow in a Queen size, but once I received the King, I realized what a blessing it was to have the bigger size. Regardless of your bed size, having a king-size pillow is so nice because you can also use it as a body pillow. Or if you’re like me, build a barricading wall to keep your partner on their side of the bed!😝 ▪️Since this pillow is going right into our faces, I did a full-on sniff test. Seems strange to do that right? But, you’d be shocked to know that another pillow we ordered smelled really bad...I’m talking musty wet dog kinda smell with a hint of foam and rotting meat. 🤢 This pillow smells NORMAL, clean, and like foam. ▪️The foam is also uniform and clean looking. It doesn't look like it was swept off of a factory floor like the other pillow we ordered which had off-white foam, with bits of random blue and orange foam, and sometimes what looked like melted/flat dirty foam. You’ll be so happy to know this is CLEAN (as seen in my video). ❌WHAT I DON’T LIKE: ▪️There isn’t much to complain about with this pillow, other than I now have to buy king-sized pillowcases. Lol! I was lucky to have one on hand - no idea why I had it, so I guess this pillow was meant to be! 🦋OVERALL:I’m so happy to have the king-sized pillow for my queen bed! When you have two king pillows, it eliminates the gap you would get between 2 queen pillows. It also looks better! My future orders for new pillows will be sizing up to a king. If you’re on the hunt for the perfect pillow with medium firmness, this is the pillow for you. This pillow springs back to its shape. No longer do I wake up with a kinked neck! That’s a HUGE plus for me!

reviews.reviewTitle: Decent shredded memory foam pillow, quite fluffy, somewhat insufficient head/neck support
reviews.reviewText: This is a reasonably decent pillow filled with shredded memory foam (as opposed to a semi-shredded larger chunks or solid block of foam in mattresses) that's well made for the most part and while it does perform better than most others I've come across, it's still somewhat insufficient for my needs with respect to head/neck support. However, I do understand that's a personal preference more than anything so you may or may not be fine with the support it provides.≡ Physical buildThe physical build quality appears just fine, similar to most other pillows at this price range nowadays and there isn't anything fancy about this particular one either. The zipper for the outer cover isn't as smooth as I'd like it to be but that's far from a deal breaker. It has an inner pillow filled with shredded memory foam and simulated down material (i.e. down-alt, whatever it's made of).The inner top and bottom sides have pockets of sorts filed with down-alternative fiber-fill (again, whatever that is) whereas it's depicted as being all-around inside which isn't exactly true. While the craftsmanship of the pillow as a whole isn't anything spectacular, it's also by no means low quality or even poor. Again, it's on par (or perhaps even slightly better) with most others I've come across at this price range with some minor issues (zipper being one).≡ Bit of extra shredded foamA small bag of shredded memory foam is included and I used 'em all to provide a firmer support for my head/neck but you may or may not need 'em. I just wanna mention that it looks like a big bag but in fact it's just slightly more than a handful (at most 2 handfuls).≡ PerformanceSo how does it perform? Well, it barely supports my head/neck the way I want it to be with the extra foam provided. However, if I have to choose, I'd say it's insufficient for my needs. With that being said, it's better than MOST others out there at this price point. It is quite fluffy which I'm not a big fan of but perhaps that's what you like or prefer. Btw, I sleep on my sides as well as on my back.I personally don't care for fluffiness where it seems large and firm but collapses and deflates down to a sheet (bit of exaggeration here but you know what I meant) where it simply lacks adequate firmness to support my head and neck. This is similar but MUCH LESS so in comparison to most others. I should stress it again that I personally like and prefer firmer pillows where it can provide adequate support for my head and neck where I need.Of course, I don't want a rock pillow either. It's tricky business, I know. I'd say if you prefer medium-firm, then perhaps this is something you'd prefer. The extra shredded foam does help to adjust the 'firmness' I believe, it's just not enough to my liking.≡ ValueAll things considered, this s a reasonably decent shredded memory foam pillow that's medium-firm with a small bag of extra foam so adjustment (within reason) can be made to suit your needs. The overall quality is decent and the fabric is relatively soft and comfortable; however, this might not be sufficient for someone who are looking for firm pillows because it uses shredded memory foam instead of larger chunks or even entire solid blocks to support the weight of your head.It's reasonably priced at $60 for what it provides and its overall build quality as well as the amount of memory foam provided (which is the single most important factor when choosing a high quality foam pillow).

reviews.reviewTitle: Adjustable Firmness For A Comfortable Sleep!
reviews.reviewText: So far my experience with this pillow has been positive and I haven’t experienced any issues related to its quality or construction. Usually, I sleep on a King sized down-filled pillow but I find that I much prefer this adjustable memory foam pillow to it because it doesn't swallow my head. I like that the adjustable filling doesn’t smell like down sometimes does and I also appreciate that no feathers puncture through the pillowcase to poke me.The pillow arrived adequately filled and decently firm but I tried some extra filling to see how I’d like it if were firmer. I found that adding extra filling increased the height of the pillow which was great for my side sleeping but quite uncomfortable and not supportive for my back sleeping. Ultimately, I settled for less firmness which was a compromise in support between my two most frequent sleeping positions. I ended up removing the additional filling from the pillow to lower its height and I found that the pillow was still comfortable but I do occasionally like to double stack an additional pillow over it when I turn to my side to sleep. This pillow is well-sewn and constructed and I really like that I am able to adjust the support provided by the pillow as needed. I find the pillowcase and filling material to be breathable and soft against my skin and I would choose this pillow again over my down pillow!

reviews.reviewTitle: Customize Your Pillow! Adjustable Memory Foam Inserts = Huge Win for the Consumer
reviews.reviewText: [PROS] 👍✔Quality of the material is excellent, during my inspection I found the threading and attention to detail without any form of imperfections✔Adjustable pillow height option allows you to remove or add foam pellets from inside of the pillow to meet your desired height, for instance I enjoy a flatter pillow, so I was able to remove some of the foam, this is a fantastic feature because you can essentially customize your pillow to your liking✔Machine washable friendly, so long as you use a delicate option from your washer, we have 'hand wash mode' on ours[CONS] 👎✘Because of the unique design of customizable memory foam pieces, the balance of the foam pieces may feel slightly inconsistent[PRODUCT EXPERIENCE] ★ ★ ★ ★ ★👉The California Design Den Store Luxury 3-Chamber King Bed Pillow is currently priced as $69.99 at the time of this review. I've been using this pillow exclusively for 2 weeks and found the comfort to be superior to my existing king sized pillows - it feels more of a feather pillow, rather than memory foam, sort of like a blend between both, which is my preference. I simply love the fact that you can adjust the sizing!

reviews.reviewTitle: Not waking up with sore neck and shoulder
